text: Aur boht say payghumbar jo aap say pehlay huye hain unn ki bhi takzeeb ki jaa chuki hai so unhon ney iss per sabar hi kiya unn ki takzeeb ki gaee unn ko ezza phonchaee gaeen yahan tak kay humari imdad unn ko phonchi aur Allah ki baaton ka koi badalney wala nahi aur aap kay pass baaz payghumbaron ki baaz khabren phonch chuki hain
